news.headline: Georgia Power says it needs a huge increase in power capacity to meet data center demand
news.summary: With data centers flooding into Georgia, utility regulators face a big decision: Should they let Georgia Power Co. spend more than $15 billion to increase its electricity capacity by 50% over the next six years to serve computer complexes?
